sources.title: The Douglas - Review - Echo Park
sources.content: Resting in the shadows of Dodger Stadium, The Douglas is the perfect place to pre-game, post-game, or just hang out whenever the weather's nice. This dive bar doesn't have much space—mostly just a few tables inside and on the sidewalk—but the energy is always relaxed, there's a draft beer special for $5, and there's a surprisingly varied food menu for when game day drinks turn into a craving for fried things. There are vegan falafels, buttermilk fried chicken sandwiches as big as your head, Old Bay tater tots, and a weekly rotating sweet treat. Get the weekly rotating sweet treat.

sources.title: The 15 Best Restaurants & Bars Near Dodger Stadium
sources.content: Resting in the shadows of Dodger Stadium, The Douglas is the closest walkable bar to the Sunset Gate, but we'd send you here for more than just proximity reasons.
